jobDescription: We are hiring for a full time RMA Customer Service Representative. You will report to the Customer Service Manager. This position is located in our Headquarter, San Jose location.Responsibilities:Process product returns and conduct product failure analysisEnsure a high level of customer service is delivered to all customersHandle the day-to-day RMA Receiving activitiesWork closely with internal departments as requiredQualifications:Bachelor’s degreeRMA Related experience desiredGood written and verbal communication skills, proficient in EnglishMust work well in an fast-paced environment with dynamic requirements and prioritiesAttention to detail and committed to managing problems through resolutionProficient in MS Office tools such as Word, Excel and Outlook is necessaryBe able to lift 50 lbs
